snippet: A new survey of likely caucusgoers gives Mitt Romney a double-digit lead over his main rival, Newt Gingrich.
abstract: A new survey of likely caucusgoers gives Mitt Romney a double-digit lead over his main rival, Newt Gingrich.
lead_paragraph: Fresh off his strong win in Florida, Mitt Romney received more good news from a new poll in Nevada that showed him with a wide lead over Newt Gingrich just days before the state's caucuses.

headline.main: Nevada Poll Gives Romney Wide Lead
